google_reviews.author: LeeAnn Cogert
google_reviews.review: This is a non-smoking building where smoking is taking place.  If that is your cup of tea, move here.  If not, enforcement rarely can take place as the landlord relies on other tenants to take pics for proof.  That cannot happen if people are smoking inside their units.  Also, after the place filled up, there is a noticeable lack of maintenance.  As the area has become more traffic heavy, it has become less desirable as parking is not really plentiful and noise levels are high.  Also there is the train that has become more frequent over time.  The location's proximity to services is about all it has to offer other than a generally friendly group of tenants who reside there.

google_reviews.author: Robert Faitz
google_reviews.review: Great place, love the view and location. Foot traffic is always people enjoying the weather, rarely are there street people who have nothing better to do. Lively during the weekend being next to the water and the only bummer is the regulars at the restaurants who take up parking spots.

summary.text:
Good

20 Bellwether Apartments receives praise for its exceptional location, offering residents stunning views and easy access to nearby services. The vibrant surroundings make for an enjoyable living experience, particularly during the weekends when the area is bustling with activity. Residents appreciate the community atmosphere within the building, noting that interactions with fellow tenants are generally positive and contribute to a welcoming environment.

The proximity to the waterfront is highlighted as a key advantage, allowing for leisurely strolls and picturesque scenery right at the doorstep. While the lively atmosphere may not be for everyone, those who enjoy being at the heart of an active neighborhood find this aspect particularly appealing. The general consensus among satisfied tenants is that the strategic location and friendly community are significant assets to living at 20 Bellwether Apartments.

Great

Residents have expressed delight with the scenic views offered by 20 Bellwether Apartments. Situated in a prime location, the apartments boast picturesque vistas that enhance the living experience. Weekly foot traffic is often made up of people enjoying the area's ambiance, contributing to the vibrancy and appeal of the neighborhood.

Additionally, the location near the water adds to the property's charm, providing a sense of tranquility despite the bustling surroundings. The convenience of having amenities within walking distance is another noted positive, ensuring that tenants feel connected and integrated into the local scene. Recognition of these outstanding features suggests that 20 Bellwether Apartments successfully delivers on some of its promises.

Bad

Feedback from user reviews indicates that smoking enforcement is an issue in this non-smoking building. The reliance on tenants to provide photographic proof of violations is ineffective, particularly when smoking occurs indoors, contributing to dissatisfaction among non-smoking residents. This experience detracts from the overall living conditions for some.

Moreover, concerns are raised regarding maintenance, which appears to have declined after the apartments reached full occupancy. Noise levels, intensified by local traffic and increased train frequency, have also been highlighted as negative aspects. These issues suggest room for improvement to enhance tenant satisfaction and to address some practical challenges that detract from the property's positives.

Ugly

Parking headaches and noise pollution are frequently mentioned as significant drawbacks of living at 20 Bellwether Apartments. The scarcity of available parking, coupled with restaurant patrons occupying spots, generates frustration and inconvenience for residents. This situation is exacerbated during weekends when the area is most active.

Additionally, the increased frequency of passing trains contributes to unwanted noise, disrupting the peace that some tenants seek in their home environment. These persistent issues, compounded by the lack of effective management responses, represent ongoing challenges for the property. Addressing these concerns would greatly aid in improving the overall living experience and tenant contentment.
